Articles.Content: I've heard of memory leaks of the temperature gauges, but does anybody get leaks while switching views between VAB, SPH, Flight, etc.? Because I start up at 2.341 GB, but then as I click on the VAB, the memory usage spikes up to 2.7 GB. Does anybody know of a fix? Because I have had 2.8 GB usage in previous versions (.90 beta), but the leakages weren't as drastic.

If I recall correctly, that is a confirmed memory leak. Not a surprise though: most things in the game leak memory, including tweakables and simply flying around.

Edited June 22, 2015 by mythbusters844

I am suffering from this also. The only time the game used to crash on me is when I pushed the memory limit with mods.

To reduce the effect my game playing time I stated forcing opengl.

I love this game but I really think for a released game there are way too many memory leaks. Squad seems to be very slow at or incapable of fixing them.

I am assuming it will not be fixed at least until the port to Unity 5.
